pr_title: fix(engine): catch error event on multi-instance activity

timeline.body: I understand that the `getElementById` now needs an elementType, but this should always be `CALL_ACTIVITY` for this method. I also think that the return type can be specified to ExecutableCallActivity, as other elements should not be provided by this method.
timeline.bodyText: I understand that the getElementById now needs an elementType, but this should always be CALL_ACTIVITY for this method. I also think that the return type can be specified to ExecutableCallActivity, as other elements should not be provided by this method.
timeline.bodyHTML: I understand that the getElementById now needs an elementType, but this should always be CALL_ACTIVITY for this method. I also think that the return type can be specified to ExecutableCallActivity, as other elements should not be provided by this method.
timeline.author: korthout

timeline.body:
So I would change this to:
```suggestion
    final var elementType = BpmnElementType.CALL_ACTIVITY;
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
So I would change this to:

Suggested change
final var elementType = callActivityContext.getBpmnElementType();
final var elementType = BpmnElementType.CALL_ACTIVITY;
timeline.author: korthout

timeline.message:
chore(engine): apply review suggestion

Co-authored-by: Nico Korthout <korthout@users.noreply.github.com>

fix(engine): catch error event on multi-instance activity

* be aware of multi-instance activities when looking for an error catch event
* add new helper method to resolve the element based on a given BPMN element type to handle multi-instance activities
